# pn-breadcrumb



## Accessibility

- Dark mode uses `--color-primary-fg` for link text and focus outlines to meet WCAG AA contrast requirements (â‰¥ 4.5:1) against dark backgrounds.
- Focus-visible outlines are provided for keyboard navigation.
